name: Menilek
desc: One of the six heroes of Natlan and the bearer of the Ancient NameHe died during the Cataclysm 500 years ago.

customize.name: Flower-Feather Clan
customize.desc: One of the six tribes of Natlan, also known as Tlalocan. The tribe's people live alongside the Qucusaurs.

customize.text:
Menilek was a warrior from the Flower-Feather Clam.

The First Speaker, who fought alongside

customize.name: Xbalanque
customize.desc: The first Pyro Archon, who defeated the Flamelord and revived from the flames.

customize.text: about 1,000 years ago. He bore the Ancient Name Vuka before Menilek.

customize.name: Tenoch
customize.desc: A hero of Natlan, who lived 500 years ago. He didn't belong to any tribe, because he was exiled. During the Cataclysm, he united the six tribes and went to the western islands to fight a giant black monster.

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

customize.text: , Menilek joined Tenoch to fight the Abyss

customize.name: Goldflame Qucusaur Tyrant
customize.desc:
A Qucusaurus whose body has attained a supernatural form due to enduring forces that the bodies of modern Saurians cannot control.
Legends say that when the giant Qucusaur who now often dwells in the mountain fog was young, he also once followed the heroes who saved Natlan in their adventures. It is said that one of those heroes once agreed to make the pilgrimage with him together to the volcano, to save his mind back from the brink of insanity that the increasing violent power in his blood was forcing him towards. However, judging from his current title of "Tyrant," that story did not have a happy ending.

customize.text: Ngoubou, Menilek's companion, was marked by the Flamelord's Blessing. Menilek agreed to make the pilgrimage with him together to the volcano, to save his mind back from the brink of insanity that the increasingly violent power in his blood was forcing him towards. However, they didn't succeed.

customize.name: Chasca
customize.desc: The Peacemaker of the Tlalocan, the ender of all disputes.

customize.text: One of the six heroes of Natlan who took part in

customize.name: Haborym
customize.desc: The name Haborym is supposedly borne by all mortal Archons of Natlan. The current Archon is Mavuika.

customize.text: 's plan. She's the heir of the Ancient Name Vuka.

customize.name: Talking Stick
customize.desc: Most people will find this obsidian-inlaid club quite convincing indeed.

customize.name: Flower-Wreathed Feathers
customize.desc: A longbow that burns like a flame. The feathers that adorn it are said to have come from the ancient tyrant Ngoubou.
